column3: “This strain was amazing! Euphoric, happy, giggly and ready for a snack. Great with company. I'm going in for seconds!!”
“One of the best strains I've had in a while. Very even body and head high, but the euphoria is definitely the strongest aspect of it. A very fun and chill high.”

“This is a nicely balanced hybrid strain.  I purchased this as a gram on a week or so back, testing the waters out of the indicas that I normally purchase.  This is because the main symptoms I'm treating are insomnia and pain.  So this is a new feeling for me.  But lets get back to the strain.

I believe this strain is one the dispensary grows themselves, if not it still is a good stuff.  The batch date is 04/14/2017 ...”

“One of my favorite things about this strain is the smell. Very pleasant earthy smell with a hint of citrus at the end. 

The high starts with a euphoric, sharp clearheaded feeling that lasts throughout the high, followed by deeply relaxing body sedation. 
Music: 'Hey You' - Pink Floyd
Terpines: Myrcene, Limonene, Caryophyllene”

“i know someone who actually grew this indoors didn't come out to bad could of came out better with more time out into it but the end product still was pretty potent didn't get much taste but If I get my hands on it again I'll be sure to write another review

EDIT: review number 2 oh man got my hands on this gain and I'm so glad i did some nice light green beautiful nugs very sticky with a nice pungent skunk smell tha...”
“Good stuff a nice relaxing high very even and smooth. Got it cheap and ended up loving it. Would be happy to smoke again”
“A very euphoric head high mixed with a lemon-orange citrus flavor”

“Form: Shatter
Brand: Canamo Concentrates
THC: 72%

Appearance 5/5
- Amazing looking, beautiful amber colored shatter mostly translucent.

Taste 4/5
 -Nothing special, slightly harsh.

Feel 5/5
- Very euphoric indeed. I usually don't care for chemdawg strains, but the euphoria is unreal.  This stuff would be great to manage my nausea (I suffer from something that makes me feel like I'm always motion sick....vertigo ma...”

“Boss Hogg has a wonderful aroma and flavor notes. For me the euphoric effects are a bit strong but it gradually settles into a nice numbing body high which is great for my hip and back pain. I did not find that it helps with focus at all. I may have been tired from work but I know I was super absent minded after smoking this strain.”

“I tend to be a sativa girl but wanted to try this for stress relieve and lower back muscle tension. Definitely more of a body high than head high but still some cerebral effects. It completely relaxed me, muscle tension melted away. I did end up taking a nap but I am not sure that was because of the bud. Also great fro appetite stimulation. I will likely keep this on hand for when I am struggling with my back.”
“very strong euphoric effects”
“Honestly was not too impressed. Given it  was only 10.8% THC, I barely felt any effect even smoking a decent amount of it. Gave it 3 stars just for the slight calm it gave me.”
“Wow I was only half a blunt through and this strain hit me like a brick! Really impressed can't wait to smoke it again”
“uplifting, engaged, motivated high”

“This was a very sporadic strain for me. I did feel the harshness on the throats at first but few bowls later felt smooth. Does have a strong smell but has a piny scent so it's not too bad. Awesome pick!”
“Giggly, heavy indica stone.  Not the cleanest high, but get ready to giggle.”
“A true 50/50 Hybrid to the tee! Also the taste through vaporization is a tangy bit of goodness that has me lovin this strain!”

“This was a very sporadic strain for me. I did feel the harshness on the throats at first but few bowls later felt smooth. Does have a strong smell but has a piny scent so it's not too bad. Awesome pick!”
“uplifting, engaged, motivated high”
“very nice, uplifting strain.”
“All-time favorite, but hard to come by. Creative, euphoric, energetic, low-munchies. Just perfect for me. Great for social setting or creative pursuits. Wish more places carried it.”

“I have a feeling this would be a really good in a group, but unfortunately I use most of my pot in private, so I know I'm not getting the full effect. I've mostly just pulled a few buds off and put them over a screen before, but I decided to grind some up and pack a bowl for use over the next few days. Holy hell, it knocked me right on my ass. If you're gonna grind it alone, put on some rad music and prepare for a tr...”
“Real heady high, and a real skunk smell. Great strain.”
“great for arthritis and pain pain relief”
“great for arthritis and pain pain relief”
“Little rough on the throat but damn worth it because of the euphoric effect.”
“This strain was amazing and I can not wait to get my hands on more. Very euphoric and numbed my body amazingly but I still had a drive to work on things.”

“Illinois batch 17% THC. Let me just say I am not a fan. I think Boss Hogg may be the name of their cat that sprayed on the crop because all I tasted was ammonia. My house smelled like litter box after a few bowls. I did its job don't get me wrong , it has an effect, I just can't stand the flavor”
“Real heady high, and a real skunk smell. Great strain.”
“very nice, uplifting strain.”
“AmaZing strain one dab of this and my nausea was gone in seconds”
“Super Euphoric”
“Picked a pre roll of this strain from reef 24/7 done nicely by Tryke growers . Not the highest thc percent came in at 17 % but had a very good body high well done 👍🏿. 🔥🔥🔥🔥 our of 5 flames”
“Definitely one of my favorites!!!”
“long lasting”
“Energizing”

“excellent. my batch tested at 23.4%thc
i absolutly love this strain. euphoric as fuck! the body fry is awesome! just a few tokes &--HEAVEN”
“Smooth hash earthy fuely smoke. Nice head lasts awhile and I’m a seasoned toker. Harvested at 58 days under 600 watt hps”
“Some good flower”
“slow but Good high relaxed strain love it. definitely will try again”

“Really good to relax and for light weight pain.
I like being able to function on it.”
“super nice easy going high. Definitely going to work rn and it'll be a breeze. stoned but aware ✌️”

“My my I must say! I tried this strain some time ago and it’s gotten even better,Now I no why I remember it so well nice 2 took stuff without it being a straight sativa(Fire)1st time I’ve written a review so hope it helps! Would try again!”
“tastes great but more for night time”

“grows 5 to 6 feet top strain for cash crop out side so dank all around super fire top to get better yield big tops of coated super fire chem based with the bubba shape and size best strain I ever got online and. had the pre 98 bubba since 2003 and this cross of bubba and chem this turned out the best they got this one right”

“What a surprising good strain. Passed on a couple of times. Very Earthy taste I thought. Help with nerve pain, migraines and muscle aches. Smells like outdoors. I had energy, was focused and had some great conversation and food!”
“How could you not love any strain in Chemdog family! Boss Hogg is on my top 3 strains for sure!”
“Cool high!!”
“Had be giggling like it was my first time again. Loved it”
“By far the best flower I have tried so far here I keep coming back.”
“nice strain, dense flowers good smoke”
